name: Taxi City
description:
Taxi City game is a simulator of a driver living from transporting people. The game is inspired by modern Taxi applications. One such application is also inside this game.

The game is for free to playing directly in a PC browser. The game has 72 megabytes and is optimized for running on low-performance computers.

Features:
- game story - there is need to be able to live from earned money only.
- 3 cars to buy and upgrade
- Achievements for playing
- Leaderboards
- Shared ingame currency.
- Server-based data storage.

Because of it is a simulator, there is need to think a bit about funds. If you spend much money without thinking whether you can, you will probably go out of money and will end in teh game due to inability to repay obligations.

Taxi city is suitable for all age categories. It's a perfect relax to play it. One of most complex browser driving games currently.

Do you like the game? Check more free taxi games or general car games.
